direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods interact with the ResultSet and handle potential SQLExceptions in a similar manner.
Both methods manipulate the ResultSet and manage exceptions similarly, though they perform different operations (reading vs. deleting).
Both methods interact with the ResultSet, though one reads data and the other modifies it.
Both methods process ResultSet data, though one modifies the data and the other transforms it into a bean.
Both methods process ResultSet data, though one modifies the data and the other transforms it into a list of beans.
Both methods process ResultSet data, though one modifies the data and the other transforms it into a map.
